MainMenu.Credits: By Pandaros! Special Thanks to: Xweert for models and Khanx for help menu design!
MainMenu.Title: Settlers Help
MainMenu.ModDetails:
The settlers mod is a mod that introduces a large verity of new features to the game. In addition to the ones listed above, settlers also provides:
    * Placable block item stats by hovering over items in the stockpile 
    * Colony founding time in the colony menu /r/n

Settlers.Gate: When within range of a lever, at night the gate will close and during the day the gate will open. The gate opens 2 spaces from the bottom regardless of how tall or wide it is. The game must have 2 blocks above it empty, otherwise, it will destroy whatever is in these spots. Iron gates do not require a machinist.
Settlers.TeleportPad: Teleporters may only be used once every 30 seconds!
